actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to request the National Academy of Sciences to conduct a study concerning standardizing certain tests for determining potential carcinogenicity, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to request the National Academy of Science to conduct a study regarding the desirability of developing a Federal policy for the determination of the potential carcinogenicity in man of chemicals tested primarily in nonhuman test systems through the standardization of certain tests.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to request the National Academy of Sciences to conduct a study concerning standardizing certain tests for determining potential carcinogenicity, and for other purposes.
